{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:59.039
    | text      = We were talking after the show one night, and you were like, when I'm looking, the Fiend
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:05.000
    | text      = has a habit of pulling out people's old past characters and bringing them to the fore,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:09.280
    | text      = and then I read the next day about Dr. Thuganomics, and I'm like, okay, well, Dan knows what's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:13.280
    | text      = up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:14.280
    | text      = He seems to have an ability over time and space, to an extent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:19.400
    | text      = Somewhat unspoken, if I understand correctly?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:21.240
    | text      = Sort of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:22.240
    | text      = He also has a character, Bray Wyatt, is possessed by this demon called the Fiend that has superpowers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:28.319
    | text      = of some sort.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:29.319
    | text      = Naturally, this is the thing that's normal to say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:31.120
    | text      = And he's able to manipulate people's, like their psychology or something, and show them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:36.159
    | text      = something of themselves that maybe they didn't want to accept.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:40.199
    | text      = He's the ghost of Christmas past.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:44.199
    | text      = It's just... It was masterful, the short film that they put together, because it wasn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:50.039
    | text      = a match, it wasn't John Cena fighting Bray Wyatt as the Fiend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:54.680
    | text      = What it was was basically a short film where the audience was taken inside the mind of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:00.039
    | text      = John Cena.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:01.439
    | text      = John Cena, the biggest WWE wrestling superstar from the last 15 years, the hero of the children,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:10.879
    | text      = the top guy in the business, 16 time world champion, taken inside his mind and thoroughly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:18.199
    | text      = deconstructed to the point where he accepts he's the bad guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:23.759
    | text      = It was remarkable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:24.759
    | text      = This isn't so... What, did Marcel Duchamp direct this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:28.879
    | text      = Might as well have been.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:29.879
    | text      = This isn't Chia D'Andlelou?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:30.879
    | text      = What is going on?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:31.879
    | text      = It was astounding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:35.360
    | text      = First of all, the complexity and the story that it told was something I did not imagine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:42.959
    | text      = the WWE was capable of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:44.560
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:45.560
    | text      = And two, the fact that John Cena would allow that, given how big of a person he is and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:51.720
    | text      = how much he doesn't need to do something like this, he's a movie star, he's in movies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:56.480
    | text      = He doesn't need to allow Bray Wyatt to put him into a psychological prison and deconstruct
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:04.160
    | text      = his ego.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:05.160
    | text      = It's awesome.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:06.160
    | text      = No, he's auditioning for Shutter Island 2.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:08.759
    | text      = That's the one that's course AZ's going to film next, I think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:11.680
    | text      = God, it was good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:13.279
    | text      = I really... I had very scared expectations about it, because I'm an old time Bray Wyatt
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:20.360
    | text      = fan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:21.360
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:22.360
    | text      = As much as I am a wrestling fan, that's my kind of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:25.439
    | text      = Bray Wyatt's original character was a swamp hillbilly cult leader.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:29.000
    | text      = I kind of liked Bray Wyatt, to be honest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:31.120
    | text      = Talking these rambling, weird riddles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:33.279
    | text      = Nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:34.279
    | text      = Absolute nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:35.279
    | text      = So good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:36.279
    | text      = Impenetrable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:37.279
    | text      = I always want something really to work out, and then nothing ever does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:40.879
    | text      = His story lines always kind of fizzle a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:44.560
    | text      = So I had a real feeling that this was going to be another one of those things, because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:49.600
    | text      = they tried to do some Bray Wyatt spooky house matches in the past that they just were a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:54.519
    | text      = disaster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:55.519
    | text      = I just really thought they were going to do that again, and instead what they got was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:58.879
    | text      = a scathing portrait of, first of all, John Cena's character trajectory through his career,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:06.680
    | text      = to the WWE itself, to an extent, Vince McMahon, and a deeply emotional resonance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:14.939
    | text      = Because throughout it, the character of Bray Wyatt is sort of guiding John Cena through
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:20.120
    | text      = these realizations that he's the bad guy, and he gives him chances to recognize this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:28.240
    | text      = thing about himself, and because of John's ego, he can't recognize it, which leads to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:34.259
    | text      = the ultimate conclusion of John being destroyed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:37.079
    | text      = Like, it's great!
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:39.199

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:48.000
    | text      = I don't think that I am in the same way that most people like wrestling, but I think it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:06:52.600

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
